Title: Voices from the List
Actors: Steven Spielberg, Leon Leyson, Leopold Rosner, Ludmila Page
Plot: 'Voice from the List' presents the indelible true story of the enigmatic Oskar Schindler, a member of the Nazi party, womanizer, and war profiteer who risked his own reputation and even his own life to save the lives of more than 1,100 Jews during the Holocaust. "Voices from the List" is told exclusively from the testimony of survivors who owe their lives to Oskar Schindler and his list of "necessary workers." It is the perfect compliment to "Schindler's List" because it introduces us to many of the actual people who survived the Holocaust thanks to Oskar Schindler. 'Voices from the List' was produced in association with The Shoah Foundation.
